\u0020 \u0020 \u0020 Hi all, I created this app for the car enthusiast in mind and even if you\'re not, hopefully you will still enjoy it.
\u0020 \u0020 \u0020 First off, I would like to thank SaabKyle04, LLC on YouTube for giving me the permission to use sound samples and screenshots from his videos. You can visit his channel at:

\u0020 \u0020 \u0020 This app is designed to help you identify cars, not with pictures, but by what sound it makes! The idea arose when I watched a video of some WRC drivers guessing exhaust sounds created by the interviewer\'s own mouth. I really wanted to make an app related to cars in some way and thus created this sound guessing game. So the next time a car drives by, maybe you can flex some of your car knowledge and impress some of your friends.
Ending song: Klayplex - Jump \n\nIcons provided by icons8.com
1. There are 25 rounds, in which 25 of the 51 cars will be randomly chosen for each game.
2. An exhaust sound clip will play and you will have to guess out of 4 choices what kind of car it is.
3. You have 3 lives and 2 skips. If you choose the wrong answer, you will lose a life. If you use a skip, you will lose a point from your score (negative score is possible).

- Sometimes cars of the same make have really similar exhaust notes, so each answer choice will always have a car from a unique make.

 - Exhaust notes are sampled from stock cars (as far as I know).
